title: Episode 6 - Waltpaper
description: The famous Waltpaper, also known as Walt Cassidy, spills about his deep friendship with Michael Alig, the rivalry between drag queens and Club Kids, and the development of "Heroin Chic" in the early '90s.
dc:creator: WOW Podcast Network
